name: Foxtrot Media, Inc.
description:
Foxtrot Media is a web development, search engine optimization, and website hosting firm in Baltimore, MD. We specialize in open source, CMS systems written in PHP. We pride ourselves in the very best customer service at the most competitive prices. Pick a CMS: Drupal, WordPress, Joomla.
